title: Sample swagger.yml generating server fails for boolean, integer, number types in query params
body:
Suspect this is something with the template. I dug into if go-bindata generated an old version of the templates, but regenerating generator/bindata.go and installing swagger didn't fix this.

Repro:

```
~/me/Development/go-opensource-work/src/github.com/jawspeak/bug-parameter-ops rm -rf cmd/ models/ restapi/
~/me/Development/go-opensource-work/src/github.com/jawspeak/bug-parameter-ops swagger validate sample-swagger.yml
The swagger spec at "sample-swagger.yml" is valid against swagger specification 2.0
~/me/Development/go-opensource-work/src/github.com/jawspeak/bug-parameter-ops swagger generate server -f sample-swagger.yml && go build ./...
2015/12/10 19:08:00 rendered model template: SearchResponse
2015/12/10 19:08:01 generated model SearchResponse
2015/12/10 19:08:01 rendered handler template: operations.GetSearch
2015/12/10 19:08:01 generated handler operations.GetSearch
2015/12/10 19:08:01 rendered parameters template: operations.GetSearchParameters
2015/12/10 19:08:01 generated parameters operations.GetSearchParameters
2015/12/10 19:08:01 rendered responses template: operations.GetSearchResponses
2015/12/10 19:08:01 generated responses operations.GetSearchResponses
2015/12/10 19:08:01 rendered builder template: operations.ServerRestAPI
2015/12/10 19:08:01 rendered embedded Swagger JSON template: server.ServerRestAPI
2015/12/10 19:08:01 rendered configure api template: operations.ConfigureServerRestAPI
2015/12/10 19:08:01 rendered doc template: operations.ServerRestAPI
2015/12/10 19:08:01 rendered main template: server.ServerRestAPI
# github.com/jawspeak/bug-parameter-ops/restapi/operations
restapi/operations/get_search_parameters.go:67: o.bindBooleanTypeInQuery undefined (type *GetSearchParams has no field or method bindBooleanTypeInQuery)
restapi/operations/get_search_parameters.go:77: o.bindIntegerTypeInQuery undefined (type *GetSearchParams has no field or method bindIntegerTypeInQuery)
restapi/operations/get_search_parameters.go:87: o.bindNumberTypeInQuery undefined (type *GetSearchParams has no field or method bindNumberTypeInQuery)
```

sample-swagger.yml (also validated with editor.swagger.io)

```
swagger: '2.0'
info:
  version: '2'
  title: Server Rest API

basePath: /rest/api/2/
schemes:
  - https
consumes:
  - application/json
produces:
  - application/json
paths:
  '/search':
    get:
      operationId: getSearch
      # Per docs: https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-spec/blob/master/versions/2.0.md#parameterObject
      # Required. The type of the parameter. Since the parameter is not located at the request body, it is limited to simple types (that is, not an object). The value MUST be one of "string", "number", "integer", "boolean", "array" or "file".
      parameters:
        - name: stringTypeInQuery
          type: string
          in: query
        - name: numberTypeInQuery
          type: number
          in: query
        - name: integerTypeInQuery
          type: integer
          in: query
        - name: booleanTypeInQuery
          type: boolean
          in: query

        - name: stringArrayTypeInQuery
          type: array
          items: 
            type: string
          in: query
        - name: numberArrayTypeInQuery
          type: array
          items: 
            type: string
          in: query
        - name: integerArrayTypeInQuery
          type: array
          items: 
            type: string
          in: query
        - name: booleanArrayTypeInQuery
          type: array
          items: 
            type: string
          in: query

      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          schema:
            $ref: '#/definitions/SearchResponse'



definitions:
  SearchResponse:
    type: object
    properties:
      message:
        type: string

```
